final¶

esis.optics.design.final(pupil_samples=10, field_samples=10, all_channels=True)¶

Final ESIS optical design prepared by Charles Kankelborg and Hans Courrier. :type pupil_samples: int :param pupil_samples: Number of rays per axis across the pupil. :type field_samples: int :param field_samples: Number of rays per axis across the field. :rtype: esis.optics.optics.Optics :return: An instance of the as-designed ESIS optics model.

Parameters

  • pupil_samples (int) –

  • field_samples (int) –

  • all_channels (bool) –

Return type

esis.optics.optics.Optics
